name: Starboard (itch) (MistOfJudgement)
description:
Gather resources, explore and automate.  Made for the Spring 2023 GADIG Jamfest with the theme "Wanderlust". Utilizes ROT.js for the terminal-style rendering.

Controls

- WASD or Arrow keys to move around

- Space to interact and drop an item from the inventory

- E to open the crafting menu

- I to access the inventory

- M to open the map (you can use +/- to zoom the map)

- Q to close any menu

Refresh the page to regenerate the world.
